StoryText: %FirstName:NPC:1% has exactly the same lunch pail as me!
Question: What are we, twins?

OptionText.Text: Tell %FirstName:NPC:1% to get a different lunch pail - and stop copying you!
Compliment %Pron:1:2% on his taste in lunch accessories!
Time to prank %FirstName:NPC:1%. Swap the lunch pails around in the fridge!

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:NPC:1% pushed me over and I grazed my elbow. I suppose I shouldn't boss people around.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I was annoyed that %FirstName:NPC:1% had the same lunch pail as me but when I tried to boss %Pron:1:2% around, he pushed me over. Fair enough, I guess.

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:NPC:1% was happy that I was so nice about his lunch pail. Then we went to play superheroes together! Yippee!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: It turns out that if you're nice to your friends, they'll pay you back a million times over! %FirstName:NPC:1% and I have the same lunch pail, and you know what? That means we're best buds.

OptionResult.Result: I swapped %FirstName:NPC:1% and I's identical lunch pails around in the fridge. I ended up having to eat his gross guerkin sandwiches, though. But it was really funny! It was worth it!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FirstName:NPC:1% saw the funny side to swapping our packed lunches over, luckily. But he has a horrible taste in sandwiches, I have to say! It was hilarious though!
